channel.title: Help please theres a hacker on my server!
channel.description:
IDK how to get rid of this guy.... its not an syi he can log on with my name like !@!@ 1 ive ip banned like 15 hosts hes been on they keep changing he's using something i have no idea what it is but i need help getting rid of it
he can log on as many accounts as he wants he ddosd a player will you give me a solution on getting rid of him?

item.title: Help please theres a hacker on my server!
item.dc:creator: @Jonnydpickle Jonnydpickle
item.description:
@Jonnydpickle wrote:

local host isnt banned and im not banned i posted my ipban logs its all the same kid

Read full topic

item.title: Help please theres a hacker on my server!
item.dc:creator: @Statik97 Statik97
item.description:
@Statik97 wrote:

try shutting off your server for like 1 day, then maybe h’ell think you got bored. So he will stop, Then start it up again. Idk how i got rid of my hacker, I tweaked around with everything, so I paid some guy 5 bucks to fix my server and he did. He put up some like hacking shield in files.

Read full topic
